overview: A Merchant Navy hero of the Korean War returns to England after three years of captivity in Communist hands, his mind confused by brain-washing and indoctrination at the hands of his captors, and accepts a post as an instructor at the Outward Bound Sea School.
tagline: A Stirring Saga of the Sea -- and a Heart-warming story about a place that makes boys men and men into heroes
title: The Blue Peter
